artist: Calligrapher: Weiming Lu; Author: Yuen Yi-shan
creditline: Gift of funds from Virginia Kremen in memory of Dr. Arnold Kremen
description: three "layers" of text -large light grey characters, small medium grey characters and one line of thin black characters at center of sheet; large red seal, LLQ; two smaller red seals, URQ; thin paper
title: As Cool Air Arises Gently, Birds Descend Slowly
